mapper.select: select count(1) from module where name=#{name} or keyword=#{keyword}
select name,lowthreshold,highthreshold,delta,normalsample,abnormalsample from module where name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
select `index` name,highthreshold,lowthreshold,delta,normalsample,abnormalsample from module a join module_config b on a.keyword = b.keyword where b.clientid=#{clientid}
select a.name,a.keyword,b.protocolid id from module a left join protocol_relationmap b on b.keyword = a.keyword;
mapper.update: update module set lowthreshold=#{lowthreshold}, highthreshold=#{highthreshold}, delta=#{delta}, normalsample=#{normalsample}, abnormalsample=#{abnormalsample} where name=#{name}
